about_the_game:
Late Models are roaring to the green flag in Tony Stewart's All-American Racing!

Expand your racing empire by starting a Late Model team in Career Mode, and then see how you compare in Online Multiplayer, run some practice laps in Quick Race, or compete in a Late Model Championship.

Download the Late Models now, and we'll see you out on the track!


* Add the Late Model series to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing

* Drive a whole new car, with its own unique handling

* Race the Late Model in every game mode
detailed_description:
Late Models are roaring to the green flag in Tony Stewart's All-American Racing!

Expand your racing empire by starting a Late Model team in Career Mode, and then see how you compare in Online Multiplayer, run some practice laps in Quick Race, or compete in a Late Model Championship.

Download the Late Models now, and we'll see you out on the track!


* Add the Late Model series to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing

* Drive a whole new car, with its own unique handling

* Race the Late Model in every game mode

subs.option_text: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Late Model Series Pack (Unlock_LateModel) - $5.99

package_groups.title: Buy Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Late Model Series Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit versions of Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X (Requires at least 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit version of Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supports DirectInput and XInput steering wheels and controllers

short_description: Late Models come to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing!
